verses.1: Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.
verses.2: Mipilte in pilna thu gen a, mihaite in haina thu gen hi.
verses.3: Topaʼ mit in mun khempeuh mu a, misia, mipha, hong encik kim hi.
verses.4: Kam khum in nuntakna piangsak a, kam sia in lung gimsak hi.
verses.5: A paʼ hilhna a ngai nuam lote mihai hi a, hilhna a mang nuamte mipil ahi hi.
verses.6: Thuman miteʼ neihsa kip a, migiloteʼ hauhna in lungkham a guan hi.
verses.7: Mipilteʼ kampauna in pilna khangsak a, mihaiteʼ lungsimah thuman lohna bek om hi.
verses.8: Topa in migiloteʼ biakpiakna kihhuai sa a, thuman miteʼ thungetna ah lungdam hi.
verses.9: Topa in migiloteʼ gamtatna kihhuai sa a, thuman a deih mite a it hi.
verses.10: A gamta khial mite nakpi takin kithuhilh a, thukihilhna a mang nuam lote in sihna thuak ding uh hi.
verses.11: Sihna gam sungah a omte nangawn Pasian in mu ahihleh, mihingteʼ ngaihsutna tel muh zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.12: A kihisak mite in kithuhilhna ngai nuam lo uh a, mipilte kiangah thu dong ngei lo uh hi.
verses.13: Lungdamna in maitaisak a, lungkhamna in maigumsak hi.
verses.14: Thungaihsun theite in pilna zong uh a, mihaite ahihleh a theih lohna uh tawh lungkim uh hi.
verses.15: Mizawngte lungkham tawntung uh a, a lungdam mite in nuntak nuamsa mahmah uh hi.
verses.16: Hau napi-in lungkham sangin zawng napi-in Topa zahtakna hoih zaw tham hi.
verses.17: Kitawngtawng kawmin sameh lim pen nekna sangin ki-it diamdiamin anteh meh nek hoih zaw hi.
verses.18: Lungtomna in kitotna piangsak a, lungduaina in kilemna piangsak hi.
verses.19: Mi thadahte in mun khempeuh ah haksatna tuak a, mi thumante in haksatna tuak kha lo hi.
verses.20: Ta pilte in a pa lungdamsak a, ta haite bek in a nu simmawh hi.
verses.21: Mihaite in a hai mah uh lungdam pih a, mipilte ahihleh a manin gamta uh hi.
verses.22: Lim ngaihsut loin sepna tawh bangmah piang zo lo a, limtakin geelna tawh maa kitun zo bek hi.
verses.23: A hun mahin dawn pah theihna lungkimhuai a, a kilawm kammal tawh dawn pah theihna hoih zaw kan hi.
verses.24: Mipilte in nuntakna lampi zui to uh a, sihna lampi zui suk lo uh hi.
verses.25: Topa in mi kiphasakteʼ inn phel khiatsak a, meigongteʼ neihsa hut pih hi.
verses.26: Topa in migiloteʼ ngaihsutna kihhuai sa a, midikteʼ kampaunate hoih a sa hi.
verses.27: A man loin sum ngahna in inn sung lungkhamsak a, sumgolh a deih lote a nuntak sauvei nuam hi.
verses.28: Mihoihte in a kampau ding ngaihsun phot a, migiloteʼ pau pakna pen thusia tawh kizom hi.
verses.29: Topa in midikteʼ thungetna ngai a, migiloteʼ thungetna thudon lo hi.
verses.30: Maitaina in lung nuamsak a, thuhoih zakna in lungdamsak hi.
verses.31: Kithuhilhna zuih theihna pen mipilteʼ lakah kihel theihna ahi hi.
verses.32: Kihilh ding a ut lote a mahmah a kisusia hi a, kithuhilh ding a utte pil semsem ding hi.
verses.33: Topa zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.
